snippet: President Petro O. Poroshenko of Ukraine addressed a joint session of Congress and sought advanced weaponry to fend off what he called an ongoing invasion by Russian forces, but so far, the United States has promised only nonlethal assistance.
abstract: Ukrainian Pres Petro O Poroshenko implores US Congress to provide heavy military equipment to Ukraine's soldiers, who are battling with Russian-backed forces in the eastern part of Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: President Petro O. Poroshenko of Ukraine addressed a joint session of Congress and sought advanced weaponry to fend off what he called an ongoing invasion by Russian forces, but so far, the United States has promised only nonlethal assistance.

headline.main: Ukraine Leader’s Plea Nets Less Than He Wanted
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Leader’s Plea Nets Less Than He Wanted
